p: In this study, cefoxitin was used as the marker of mecA/mecC mediated by methicillin resistant S. aureus and vancomycin (VRE) drug of choice for disk diffusion method as recommended by CLSI guidelines. On the other hand, the concentration values (MIC and MBC) and fractional inhibitory concentration index were determined by MHB broth microdilution method as described by Eshetu [ 3, 26, 29, 30].
